value.title: StarCraft 2: TERRAN VS ZERG INSANITY! (Clem vs Reynor)
value.excerpt: An insane Terran versus Zerg between Clem and Reynor at the professional level of StarCraft 2. This game showcases some of the highest level SC2 with both players constantly trying out to outsmart and outmicro the other. The skill level of the game in general is continously rising and it's noticable,
